name: Brawl Dash
description:
UpArrow/W/Space -> Jump

RightArrow/D -> Attack

DownArrow/S -> Gadget

Tired of seeing the wifi logo? Annoyed by Bad Randoms? Can't forget that one missed trickshot by ⚔️Mᴏͥʀᴛͣɪͫsᵍᵒᵈ⚔️ ??  Don't know to which wall smash your device???

Don't worry! There's a solution!!

This is Brawl Dash. Here you are alone. and can do whatever you want. I think.

Anyway, The Offline version of Brawl Stars is here, so the only bad random is you. All original mechanics are applied to brawlers and maps, including some brawl remixes. Just make sure to not die.
